hero.name: Almila Su
hero.description: Hi, I'm Almila. I'm a full-stack developer. If you are looking for a Developer who to craft solid and scalable frontend products with great user experiences. Let's shake hands with me.

list.name: JavaScript
list.description: Deep knowledge of ES6+ features and asynchronous programming for developing modern web applications.

list.name: React.js
list.description: Expert in component-based architecture, hooks, state management, and performance optimization.

list.name: Node.js
list.description: Experience in RESTful API development, database integration, and backend architecture.

profile.title: Profile
profile.aboutText1: My passion for web technologies combines with my desire to continuously learn and improve myself. I love developing user-focused, performant, and modern web applications.
profile.aboutText2: I am a developer who is inclined to teamwork, has problem-solving skills, and attaches importance to writing clean code.

list.name: Workintech
list.description: A simple, customizable, minimal setup cookie plugin that allows your users to select which cookies to accept or decline.

list.name: Random Jokes
list.description: A fun application that serves random jokes to users. Includes API integration and state management.

list.name: Journey
list.description: Social platform created for travel planning and experience sharing. Responsive design and user-friendly interface.
